raw_comment: I noted that the percentage of younger generations is more significant in practically every country when compared to overÂ 40-year-olds. This is intriguing because it demonstrates how the younger generation is more optimistic about their future than previous generations. I wonder if this might be due to both groups' prejudice towards themselves. Within their age, younger individuals are more confident. On the other hand, older adults feel they are better at controlling the world. This relates to my community because we are around these regions. A title could be Optimistic generations of young adults.
ace_sentences: In practically every country, the percentage of younger generations is more significant than the percentage of over-40-year-olds.
The younger generation is more optimistic about its future than previous generations.
I wonder about a possible cause.
This fact might be due to prejudice of both groups towards themselves.
Within their age group, younger individuals are more confident.
Older adults feel that they are better at controlling the world.
This fact relates to my community.
My community is around these regions.
A title could be "Optimistic generations of young adults".
